Title: Sempra eyes FID for Phase 2 of Port Arthur LNG this year
Description: Sempra said that, as the project gains momentum, it expects to make a final investment decision (FID) on Phase 2 of Port Arthur LNG in Texas before the end of 2025.
Author: JS

Title: Russian-sanctioned tanker loads at Arctic LNG 2, fourth this year
Description: An LNG tanker sanctioned by the EU and US has loaded cargo at Russia's 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG export plant, making it the fourth loading this year.
Author: JS

Title: Excelerate Energy buys LNG ship, eyes Caribbean growth opportunities
Description: Excelerate Energy is reinforcing its long-term growth strategy with the acquisition of an LNG carrier, Excelerate Shenandoah, marking the companyâ€™s first owned vessel slated for conversion into a floating storage and regasification unit.
Author: CK

Title: Venice Energy sells Outer Harbor LNG project in South Australia to AG&P LNG
Description: Australian energy infrastructure developer Venice Energy has sold its Outer Harbor LNG import terminal project in South Australia to AG&P LNG, following the signing of a sales agreement.
Author: CK

Title: NextDecade secures equity commitments from TotalEnergies, GIP for Rio Grande LNG Train 4
Description: US LNG project developer NextDecade has secured up to $1.8 billion in equity commitments from TotalEnergies and Global Infrastructure Partners  to finance the fourth liquefaction train at its Rio Grande LNG project in Texas.
Author: CK
